title: Does Riot forget about old behaviour or does it still keep as evidence for a ban?
body: Ye,if i played 100 games in the span of 2 months at the first 25 was toxic asf and got an chat restriction or low queue for 5 or 10mins and the rest of the games are all honors and etc and after that u get another ban for something does riot then count the previous record of you? Or does it dissaper? It seems to stay always which is pretty dumb...??
